title: Google Search on desktop tests redesign that puts Images, Video, and more to the left
content:
Google has been spotted testing a new redesign for Search that moves alternate search methods like Google Images over to the left-hand side.

The post Google Search on desktop tests redesign that puts Images, Video, and more to the left appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has been spotted testing a new redesign for Search that moves alternate search methods like Google Images over to the left-hand side.
